song.englishname: I Am the God That Healeth Thee

english.verse1: I am the God that healeth thee. I am the Lord your Healer. I sent My Word and healed your disease. I am the Lord your Healer.
english.verse2: You are the God that healeth me. You are the Lord my Healer. You sent Your Word and healed my disease. You are the Lord my Healer
